name: Aman Kumar
education: B.Tech in Electronics and Computer Engineering
summary: Based in Varanasi, I completed my high school education locally and earned a B.Tech in Electronics and Computer Engineering from VIT Chennai in 2026. I am passionate about full stack Java development and have hands-on experience building applications and websites using Java and Flutter. During my academic journey, I actively participated in numerous cultural and technical events, and also served as the head of the organizing committee for a technical club in college.
